name: Stock Bazaar (Downloadable)
description:
Want to learn about stock but not take any risks as you have no experience, then play this simulation of investing in stocks of companies. With rates changing by time you have to be quick and take serious measures, sometimes it will be loss but sometimes also a massive gain.

Experience the thrill.

Available in Android too:

https://danishnathani10.itch.io/stock-bazaar-apk-downloadable
